page.title: 10TRADE IN TYWARDREATH AREA
page.content: Trade is{centred in the village}of Tywardreath. It is{fairly self {contained}in that it has 2 grocery shops, a greengrocery, one butcher, one post office, two hairdressers, one cobbler, one haberdashery, a public house, a restaurant and a fish and chip shop which also sells a tremendous variety of other hot take - away food.{Mobile shops}selling fruit and vegetables and fish come to the village. There is also a{garage}which does car repairs but does not sell petrol. For their{weekly shopping}people might travel to St. Austell by bus, car or train. Otherwise they go to Truro for{ {larger items,}or possibly travel to Plymouth. Another area of trade is our{school {tuck shop.}Here biscuits and crisps are sold by the older children.
